title: Chongwu Wuyu
synopsis: The story takes place on the planet "Shenzhou 100" far away from the earth. A group of pets originally lived a happy life. Unexpectedly, they were disrupted by the villain headed by Baozi. The beautiful planet was destroyed and the pets lost their happy life. The Pokemon, headed by the Snoring Monkey, and all the people in the Pet Kingdom, after a lot of competition with the villains, finally defeated the villains, headed by Baozi, and the planet "Shenzhou 100" returned to calm. ()translated from iqiyi
